firewall_group.description: Firewall group to update (name or ID)

no_egress_firewall_policy.description: Detach egress firewall policy from the firewall group

no_ingress_firewall_policy.description: Detach ingress firewall policy from the firewall group

no_port.description: Detach all port from the firewall group

no_share.description: Restrict use of the firewall group to the current project

port.description: Port(s) (name or ID) to apply firewall group.  This option can be repeated

private.description: Restrict use of the firewall group to the current project. This option is deprecated and would be removed in R release.

project_id.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by id

project_name.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by name

public.description: Make the firewall group public, which allows it to be used in all projects (as opposed to the default, which is to restrict its use to the current project). This option is deprecated and would be removed in R release.

share.description: Share the firewall group to be used in all projects (by default, it is restricted to be used by the current project).
